resources.string: >> On multiplying 8x+5y=9 by 2, 3x+2y=4 by 5 and subtracting, we get x=-2
>> Area = 40 square units >> Height = 8 units >> Area of rhombus = Base × Height >> 40 = Base × 8 >> Base = 40/8 = 5 units
>>Looking at lines of numbers from the top >>9×8 = 72; 72×8 = 576; 576×8 = 4608 >>0
>>Each number indicates its position in the grid. >>55 indicates row 5 columns 5.
>>There are two sequences arranged alternately. >>In each sequence the number is the square of the previous number in that sequence. >>6,561 is the square of 81.
>>(1st row)x(2nd row)x(3rd row) = 4th row. >>Let the missing number in the third column be x. >>Then, 8x5xX = 320. >>40X =320 >>X = 8.
>>In the first column, 12×6 = 72; 18÷6 = 3. >>In the third column, 16×8 = 128; 32÷8 = 4. >>In the second column, 14×8 = 112. >>So, the missing number = 24÷8 = 3.
>>(1st row*1st row)+(2nd row*2nd row) >>+(3rd row*3rd row)=4th row >>First column, 4*4+2*2+1*1=21 >>second column, 5*5+3*3+8*8=98 >>Third column, 6*6+7*7+3*3=94
>>The center number is the product of the top two numbers divided by the bottom number >>7
>>All the others are the same figure rotated >>2
>>Starting at 10 and moving three segments clockwise yields the series 10, 11, 14, 19, ?, 35. >>The difference between terms in the series is the sequence of odd numbers 1, 3, 5, 7, 9, 11. >>26
>>3527 >>In the others the sum of the first two numbers is equal to the sum of the second numbers >>For example 5+2 = 6+1.
>>It is the sum of the two digits (9+8) in the quadrant directly opposite. >>17
>>Numbers are obtained by adding pairs of digits i.e. with 571219: 5 + 7 = 12; 7 + 12 = 19. >>To follow this same pattern 971613 would have to be 971623.
>>86. >>Add five straight down >>Add ten sideways >>Add fifteen diagonally.
>>16 >>Each number in the bottom rows is the sum of the number above it and the previous number.
>>The numbers in each line contain the digits 1 – 9 once each only >>7
>>When you look at the relationship of each set of top and bottom numbers you will see that 12 is 2 x 6, 24 is 3 x 8, 36 is 4 x 9, 45 is 5 x 9, 60 is 6 x 10, and 84 is 7 x 12. >>12
>>The missing number is 4. The sum of three numbers in each box is 12 >>12
>>The number formed at the top is half of the number formed at the bottom >>i.e. 358 x 2 = 716 >>1
>>The missing number is 6. >>The two numbers opposite each other always total 21. >>15 + 6 = 21. The other numbers: 17 + 4 = 21 13 + 8 = 21, 11 + 10 = 21
>>The odd one out is 78. It is 39 x 2. The other numbers are all evenly divisible by 37.
>>Combined age in 15 years = 107. >>4 × 15 = 60, therefore combined age now is 107 – 60 = 47 >>In 6 years time, therefore, combined age will be >>47 + 24 (4 × 6) = 71.
>>Multiply the bottom two numbers then take the square root, >>i.e. 1×4 = 4 and √4 = 2. >>1
>>8 >>Each number in the segment at the bottom is the sum of the four numbers in the sections either side. >>Thus 8 + 3 + 4 + 3 = 18.
>>Each number is the sum of the last two digits of the previous number, preceded by the remaining numbers in reverse.34826
